Summary: RED/ORANGE BRIGHT LIGHT..DISC SHAPED,HUGE, HOVERING OVER WOODS
divs: sighting detailsat twilight,dusk,just after sunset,i was putting away some games my brother,cousin,& i had been playing. i was 12 years old, my brother two years younger, my cousin three years younger than me. as i put the games on the shelf, i looked out the window & my brother & cousin were standing in the front yard watching this light across the highway hovering over the woods\trees. i ran out to observe it too. our house was on one of the most busy highways. it had all the main traffic in the rural area..the truck traffic, everything, this was before the interstate was built,so traffic was always constant. taking mental notes of alot of the surroundings during this sighting, i noticed no traffic was going by & no neighbors were outside in their yards from our viewpoint. we three watched the huge light for quite a bit. i knew my parents were in the garage at that moment. my dad was working with some power tools at the time. he & my mom were having a dicussion. i ran to the garage & i begged them to come to see the ufo. at that moment, my dad was also mad because his power tools were not working properly..power was going on and off. i screamed "it's because of the ufo"! not convincing them to look, i ran back to the front yard with my brother & cousin. we contunied to watch it. the object just hovered over the treetops, very low. as for distance, i cannot correctly say what the distance was. but the woods it hovered over is an area we had played in many times so it was close, & very visible from our front yard. the object was as bright as anything i had ever seen, orange\red light that was disc shaped. the size was huge, like a football field. it glowed very bright againest the dusk colored summer sky. it seemly had a pulsating effect to it, but no sound. we contunied to watch and suddenly the object just blinked out..so to say. in a snap, it all seemed to go to the center, to like a dot, then it was gone. we didn't see the object again. the length of time of the sighting had to be at least 10 minutes..plus. this is all very vivid to me and embeded in my memory. i do not believe there was any time lost during this event. i remember during the event having a feeling like it may have been just for us to see.
